post.summary: Gets recursiv customer messages for a portfolio, plant, subplant or device.
post.description:
This endpoint returns a limited list of customer messages recursive for a portfolio, plant, subplant or single device
in descending order from request property "from".
            
To fetch more items use the property marker of the last returned CustomerMessageResponse object. 
This marker can be passed as reference in the request property "marker". Both request properties "from" and
"marker" can not be passed at the same request, otherwise a 400 bad request will be returned.
            
The request property "componentId" addresses the root component (plant, subplant or device) and all underlying components of the request.
If "componentId" is null or empty, the customer messages of the the complete portfolio (user-dependend) and all underlying components will be returned as a limited list.

get.summary: Returns a list of available widget definitions for passed componentId.
get.description:
Returns a list of widget definitions, that are available for current user. A widget definition does not
contain data of the widget. Depend on the widget type (e.g. EnergyAndPower or Weather) the client has to
query further endpoints to collect the necessary data for the widget visualization. If parameter "componentId" is set, 
widgets related to this component (e.g. plant, device, subplant, etc.) will be returned, otherwise available 
widgets for all authorized components (Portfolio) will be returned.

parameters.name: componentId
parameters.description: The id of the component. Components are plants, plant-groups, devices and sub-plants.

404.description: ComponentId not found or not authorized

ComponentResponse.description: Component response object. Component is e.g. a device, plant, subplant, etc.

componentTags.description: Defines the tags of the component, e.g. Pv, Battery, Generic, EnergyAndPowerOut, EnergyAndPowerInOut.

componentId.description: The component id (e.g. deviceId, plantId, subPlantId) OR null for complete portfolio of the user

from.description: The from date time in utc. Messages will be returned in descending date order from this date time. If from is set, marker has not to be transfered.

marker.description: The marker of the message, where the fetching has to be proceed. If marker is set, from has not to be transfered.
Gets the unique marker of the message. This marker can be used to determine the starting position of the search.

deviceSerialnumber.description: Gets the serial number of the device.

deviceId.description: Gets or sets the device id.

plantId.description: Gets the plant id. Do not have to be displayed when requested component is a plant.

plantName.description: Gets the plant name. Do not have to be displayed when requested component is a plant.

messageTag.description: Gets the message tag. Represents the resource id for the message text.

eventTypeExtension.description: Gets the event type extension, e.g. none, incomming, outgoing.

messageGroupTag.description: Gets the message group tag. Has to be translated by the resources for the message groups.

position.description: The argument position in the resource text.

valueType.description: The type of the value, e.g. string, int, double, timestamp.

deviceId.description: Gets or sets the device id.

now.description: The response object for latest weather.

WeatherForecastLatestResponse.description: The weather forecast object for latest timestamp.

time.description: Utc timestamp of the returned weather.

iconId.description: Id of the weather icon. E.g. 2 = Cloudy, 61 = half rainy and half sunny. The corresponding night icon is 100 higher, e.g. 161 = half rainy and half clear sky.

WeatherForecastDayResponse.description: The weather forecast object for a whole day.

iconId.description: Id of the weather icon. E.g. 2 = Cloudy, 61 = half rainy and half sunny. The corresponding night icon is 100 higher, e.g. 161 = half rainy and half clear sky.

minTemperature.description: The minmum temperature of the day.

maxTemperature.description: The maximum temperature of the day.

dateTimeBegin.description: Begin time stamp of the measurement query (utc).

dateTimeEnd.description: End time stamp of the measurement query (utc).

componentId.description: Unique identifier of the component, e.g. plantId, deviceId, etc. Multiple components can be passed as comma-separated list.

resolution.description: Resolution of the interval (FiveMinutes, OneDay, OneWeek, etc.).

timezone.description: Gets or sets the timezone (IANA time tone id).

aggregate.description: Requested aggregation function (min, max, mean, etc.).

multiAggregate.description: Gets or sets the aggregation function, if multiple components are requested.

values.description: Values of the requested device and channel.

componentId.description: Gets or sets the component id, can also be a csv list of component ids.

channelId.description: Gets or sets the channel id.

multiAggregate.description: Gets or sets the multi aggregate (Avg, Sum, Min, Max).

MenuItem.description: The menu item for the vertical navigation.

subItems.description: Sub menu items of the current menu item.

componentId.description: Unique identifier of the component, e.g. plantId, deviceId, etc. Multiple components can be passed as comma-separated list.

values.description: Values of the requested device and channel.
